desc.p: Key to SEAT.COMP.SCENARIO. Must be alphanumeric. Should not exceed 35 characters.
Description of the SEAT.COMP.SCENARIO. Language multi value field.
Name of the SEAT.COMPONENT to be tested followed by the MASTER.SEAT.COMP Must be a valid SEAT.COMPONENT. Link SEAT.COMPONENT should not be a master seat component.
Name of the SEAT.COMPONENT to be tested initially. Must be a valid SEAT.COMPONENT.
